Method Detail

createCommManager

public static CommManagerIF createCommManager(java.lang.String className,
                                              java.util.Observer observer)
                                       throws CommException
createCommManager is a factory method used to create an instance of a subclass of the CommManagerIF class. This method uses the Class and Constructor classes, and the name of the communication manager to construct the instance.
Parameters:
className - is a Ljava.lang.String the class name of the CommManagerIF object to instantiate.
observer - is a Ljava.util.Observer object that will receive notifications from the CommManagerIF object.
Returns:
jjb.toolbox.CommMananger
Throws:
Ljjb.toolbox.net.CommException - if a communication problem occurs.
